member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Currency.CurrencyModule.PurchaseCoinAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Purchases a coin pack for the user. This method supports two ways to purchase: - the 'rgn-coin' packs in-app purchase - the game specific coin pack. For example you can sell 'game-coin' for 'rgn-coin' Note: this method requires valid ApiKey in your RGN credentials.
member.param: Unique id of the coin pack that was returned by the method
The number of packs to purchase at once
The transaction id of the in-app purchase. Provide in case 'rgn-coin' is purchased.
The receipt of the in-app purchase. Provide in case 'rgn-coin' is purchased.
A token to cancel the operation.

member.summary: Adds the rgn-coin currency to the user in in-app purchase plugin callback after verifying the reciept locally 1. Start in-app purchase process 2. Wait for the user to make the in-app purchase transaction 3. Verify locally on device the reciept after successful purchase 4. Call this method with the appropriate in-app item id () Note: this method requires valid ApiKey in your RGN credentials.
member.param: Unique id of the rgn-coin pack that was returned by the method
The transaction id of the in-app purchase
The receipt of the in-app purchase
A token to cancel the operation.
